title: Troubleshoot Access Denied Issue
description: A user is reporting they are receiving an 'Access Denied' error when trying to access a folder they believe they should have access to.

tasks.description: Identify the user and the specific folder they are trying to access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has the required information to begin troubleshooting.

tasks.description: Check the Access Control List (ACL) on the folder to see which groups have permission to access it.
Check the user's group memberships and determine that they are not a member of any of the authorized groups, explaining this to the user.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the root cause of the issue (lack of permissions) and communicates it clearly.
